channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Legendrian Hopf links in L(p,1)
item.description: arXiv:2409.02582v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We classify Legendrian realisations, up to coarse equivalence, of the Hopf link in the lens spaces L(p,1) with any contact structure.
item.dc:creator: Rima Chatterjee, Hansj\"org Geiges, Sinem Onaran

item.title: Multiplicity free covering of a graded manifold
item.description: arXiv:2409.02211v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We define and study a multiplicity free covering of a graded manifold. As an application of our research we give a new conceptual proof of the theorem about equivalence of categories of graded manifolds and symmetric $n$-fold vector bundles.
item.dc:creator: Elizaveta Vishnyakova

item.title: Persistence K-theory
item.description: arXiv:2305.01370v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: This paper studies the basic K-theoretic properties of a triangulated persistence category (TPC). This notion was introduced in our earlier papers on triangulation, persistence, and Fukaya categories (arXiv:2304.01785 and arXiv:2104.12258) and it is a type of category that can be viewed as a refinement of a triangulated category in the sense that the morphisms sets of a TPC are persistence modules. We calculate the K-groups in some basic examples and discuss an application to Fukaya categories and to the topology of exact Lagrangian submanifolds. The second version contains some changes in the exposition and the correction of some minor imprecisions.
item.dc:creator: Paul Biran, Octav Cornea, Jun Zhang
